title: Assistant needs to download data ???
content:
1. Phone is set in Italian.
2. Vocal output is set in Italian.
3. Assistant is set in Italian and English.

Question 1: how many places language has to be set?

Regarding point 3 this is how settings look: it's in Italian but it says "Assistant languages" on top and you see both italian and english.

Question 2: why under english it says "The new google assistant is not supported in these languages on your device"

If I remove english

when saying "ok google" instead of the usual assistant tab at the bottom the following full page appears

It says: "Assistant needs further downloads. An error occurred: make sure to be online and retry". If I hit the "download" button, it returns a "no connection" error.

Please help.
Thanks
category: Google Assistant and Voice Actions, Google Pixel 4 XL
